data.title: Delicious
data.text: I love their whole wheat dough! We live in Franklin so we often get take-out b/c the wait can be quite long to dine in.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Mandi! We appreciate your review and are looking forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: good food for families.
data.text: On warm days, you can sit outside and enjoy Franklin's charm.  Love the Cosmic Karma with a craft beer.  Kids can play in the game room.

data.title: Great pizza and soup
data.text: Their house mushroom soup and tortilla soup were fantastic! Really good pizza as well and lots of options.  Very kid friendly

data.title: Great PIZZA and SERVICE
data.text: Went to Mellow Mushroom today for pizza - love the location of this restaurant (right on town square) - got table right away, didn't have to wait long for pizza - had great waiter (Cory) who even gave us along with take home boxes for this wonderful pizza, also gave us drinks to go!  Very sweet guy!  This place has the BEST pizza anywhere!! Be sure to visit when in Franklin, TN!!

data.title: Victim of its success
data.text: We do love the MM but we always have to wait a long time both to be seated and for the delicious pizza. Maybe we need another pizza place in downtown Franklin? The nice thing is, musicians often play outside, so at least the wait is entertaining!

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Pam, We appreciate you taking time out of your day to let us know how we're doing! We are truly sorry to hear about the wait times. We want you to know we are working hard to reduce our ticket times and have made steps in the right direction. Our pizzas are baked to order, so this causes a delay in time, but we are thrilled to hear you enjoy our live music and food. Please don't let this deter as we are always striving to be better and want your next visit to be the best it can be. Thank you for your patronage!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Girls Trip
data.text: We headed downtown for boutiques and shopping and stopped in here to eat lunch.  All I had known is they were known for their breads so we got the pretzels, fold over and Garlic Bread.  It was all really good and the left overs were great for a late night snack!

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad to hear you enjoyed it! Thank you for taking the time to give us a great review. Please come back and see us soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best pizza and Pokemon Go in downtown Franklin
data.text: This is largely a family-focused restaurant, so stay away if you're looking for romantic. But if you want a fun environment with terrific pizzas, salads, and hoagies, this is your place. Plus, ask to sit at one of the many tables outside and prepare to clean up on Pokemon. Usually four Pokestops within range and a slew up creatures you'll have trouble finding elsewhere.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Ali, Thank you for your review and taking time out of your day to write this. We are glad to hear you found our Pokestops! We've had some really unique ones pop up lately. Come back and catch more we'd love to host you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, stellar lineup of drinks,  in a fun, funky atmosphere
data.text: I've never gone to Mellow Mushroom when it was a "miss". The food is always super good. Fresh, creative pies, wonderful salads, apps to share, good for everyone from vegetarians to meat eaters. Theres a stellar selection of beers in bottle and on draft, and a full bar. If you are ever on the fence, just go. You won't ever regret it.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review! We really appreciate you taking time out of your day to let us know how we're doing. We'd love to see you again soon. Stay Mellow.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food, great location and a good selection of beers!
data.text: They are located on Main Street, Franklin, TN at the circle...In-door and out-door seating. Good service, the food is Pizza, Calzone, Salads, Wings etc. They have a nice selection of beers and usually live music in the evenings. Good place to eat then take a walk up the Main Street.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Linda, 
Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We appreciate our awesome customers like yourself. We look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Never a bad meal!
data.text: We have been here about 10 times and always enjoyed what we had. My wife has a couple of go to sandwiches she loves

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, we love our fans! Come back soon and try more delicious menu items!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, location and atmosphere
data.text: My family loves to eat at Mellow Mushroom in downtown Franklin. The out side patio is right on the town square and there is usually live music playing there. My family loves the pizza and I love the Greek salad. It's a fun place to unwind after a long week or any night of the week.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Tammy, we love our customers! Thank you for your fantastic review. Come back and unwind with us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza, great service
data.text: Interesting place to visit.  Great pizza, service and decor.  We were seated by the bar which was loud and busy.  They did have a small outside area, but was a wait during busy times.  I would have liked to be seated away from the bar next time, but would go back..

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback! We would love to have the opportunity to serve you again on our patio or in our multiple dining areas - where we hope to provide you a more mellow atmosphere with your meal. Keep us in mind!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Afternoon on a Saturday
data.text:
Mt son and I stopped in for lunch and was served by Ms. Kaitlyn.
She was a wonderful server, very helpful and knowldegeable. Our drinks never got empty and the Pizza was heavenly.
We have been to several other Mellow Mushroom restaurants, but this one is special since it is so close to our home.
We will be back!

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time here! Having great service makes a difference, and we want to be sure each time you come to Mellow you have an exceptional experience. We are looking forward to hosting you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Typical Mello mushroom
data.text:
Been to Atlanta, Savanna and now Franklin.  They were all the same.

That being said, all very yummy.  Best pizza chain in my opinion.  If you have kids   and want to eat right away, this should be your go to restaurant as you visit downtown franklin.

Price is modest.  Service is good.  Served quickly.

owner_response.author: RebeccaAnnNoble, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: David, thank you for being a fan of Mellow Mushroom. "Best Pizza Chain" means a lot to us! Come back and see us soon and let us know what we can do to make your experience five stars.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Party of 2
data.text: Wife and I love Mellow Mushroom. The decor is always interesting and service is great. We atopped in at this one in Franklin and we were not let down. I have not had anything else from here but pizza. So if like pizza I feel you will love their pizza.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Party of 2 is welcome anytime! Thank you for your review. We take pride in our service, and enjoy hearing how our servers make a great impact in your dining experience. We look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A classic when it come to Pizza
data.text:
You can always count on Mellow Mushroom to give you a great pie ! This one is no exception and remain our go to for a realy good Pizza. Our all time favorite is the Funky Q Chicken... With extra cheddar cheese this is probably the best Pizza i ever had. The cameralized onion, the swrill of BBQ sause a touch of bacon... Now here is the surprise in Frankln on the terrace, you get live music which make it a unique destination in the Mellow Mushroom world. 
The servie is friendly and very helful, the place run smoothly and is a great experience.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Come back and join us for some live music on the patio before the season is over. We really appreciate you taking the time to write this review and look forward to hosting you again soon! Stay Mellow.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food all the time
data.text: If you are hungry and need something to filk you up, their pizzas, hoagies or other foods will suite you just fine.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write that fantastic review! Good food all the time is why we do what we do. See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: My Favorite Mellow Mushroom!
data.text: I've ate at quite a few Mellow Mushroom's over the years but this is my favorite location. It's located in downtown Franklin in a beautiful building. The atmosphere is awesome here and the food is delicious. Their pizza and sandwiches are fantastic and they also have an extensive drink menu. I love this place. It's such an asset to downtown Franklin.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to review us! We are proud to be your favorite location. Come back and see us again soon for food and drinks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pizza galore
data.text: Love their pizza's and their salads. This is a good place to meet for business lunches. Pleasant atmosphere, busy but not too noisy to have conversation with friends.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review! We are all about atmosphere and hearing those words help us know we are doing it right. We look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Our "go-to" pizza place
data.text: I live in Franklin and we will order to go or come to Mellow Mushroom if the kids want pizza.  The pizza is always good but they also have great salads.  If we go, we always like to walk to Baskin Robbins for dessert.

owner_response.author: JayHorvath, Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We love having you! Thank you for taking time to write a great review. The fact that we are your "go-to" place makes us so appreciative. See you next time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
